basics.name: Jasper Dean
basics.label: Curriculum Vitae
basics.summary:
An experienced professional, pragmatic decision maker and proven leader.

Previously held SC level government security clearance.

work.summary: Service design in a complex, distributed, micro-services and highly available production environment. Combining guidance / perspectives from the Business, Infrastructure and Software architecture to a schedule that supports the PDLC.  Furthermore, supporting the delivery of new products and service migrations from provisioning through to operational readiness and Go-Live
highlights: Translating business requirements and facilitating design sessions in order to produce technical design diagrams and supporting documentation.
Critically assessing technical designs in order to highlight single-points-of-failure and/or application-to-application dependencies.
Service reviews with Managers and Technical Leads across Infrastructure, Software Development and the wider Business.
Aligning Service Design and review activities with the Service Catalogue and CMDB.
Building effective working relationships with Managers and Technical Architects/Leads across Infrastructure and Software Development
Continuously seeking to increase efficiency via automation of manual tasks, reducing complexity and making recommendations to improve the customer experience.
Advocate cultural philosophies, practices and tools that increase the organisationâ€™s ability to deliver applications and services at high velocity.

courses: AD2208 - Theory, Context and Digital Practice
VC2003 - Negotiated Project in Visual Comms. 2
APA LE*Credit for Prior Learning at Level 1 (BSc Mobile Computing)

references.name: Jason Roberts 2007
references.reference: I have been consistently impressed by both Jasper's attitude towards this work and his performance on the job. His interpersonal and communication skills have allowed him to develop productive working relationships. Jasper is organised, efficient and extremely competent; possessing the analytical skills to diagnose problems and devise viable solutions...
